attributes.action: Grassroots football to be competitive from 7 years of age..
attributes.background: Once again the national team fail to deliver at a major football tournament and this will continue as one of the reasons is clear....Kids do not know what it feels like to compete from a young age.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
